text:
The most cherished memories that my mum and i have shared or rather the greatest memories i can ever remembered and was touched was that my mum was a hardworking mother. When we were young, she used to wait by the door when we returned from school, standing next to the window at our room, seeing us walk back footstep by footstep, going to the door to open and welcome us home. She used to do everything for us children with a smile on his face. Well, to think back, I was that tiny little pea brain at that time that thought this was just nothing. 
But as I grow up, I thought of it every day, and I misses every little action and effort she had done for us. She made me feel like I was the best in the entire world. She taught me to read and write, she taught me life lesson, she makes my favourite food when he has the free time, and sometime even if he is tired, she will prepare it for us nonetheless. All in all, she does his best to make the happiest girl.  @simplyshermaine @meijuann_ @assiracccccc ❤️

The most cherished memories that my mum and i have shared or rather the greatest memories i can ever remembered and was touched was that my mum was a hardworking mother. When we were young, she used to wait by the door when we returned from school, standing next to the window at our room, seeing us walk back footstep by footstep, going to the door to open and welcome us home. @joeywanfreedom @w.en_linqqq @parisnataliewan

My mum is my best friend and companion. She listens to me whenever i am down and gives me great advice. Ever since I was young, she has always been there for me; supporting the family and making sure my brothers and I get nothing but the best❤️ thank you Mummy for all that you have done i love you😘 @joonweh @kimbubu_ @le_kaiii

My mom is the best because of how strong she is. She came from Malaysia to Singapore to work without any education but decided to take a leap of faith anyway, she's a single mom who had to raise 2 very naughty boys and that itself wasn't an easy feat. But she was able to do it anyway, she worked long hours just to be able to provide for us and I am so proud of my mom for being such a strong and resilient woman. Mother's day is coming up and being able to win this would be so amazing, she absolutely loves coffee and being able to surprise her with this for mother's day would mean so much to me🤞🏻😊 @tanjingkai @jxce.jawx @mashira_musli

My mother’s quiet sacrifices, selfless love and unwavering support have always been my inspiration. She is a person of few words and expresses her care and concern for the family through actions ❤️ @kite23prom @caskite @berniceuseone

My mom holds a full time job yet makes it home in time every day to cook dinner for us (pre-CB and during CB), and also cooks both lunch and dinner on weekends. She runs the household efficiently and ensures that the house is clean, everyone’s schedules are adhered to and takes care of us when we are sick. All these are done on her own without any domestic help. She is truly an inspiration and my superhero! @applegsy @ashkachete @caskite
My mom is the best mom ever because she is somebody whom I know I can keep my secrets with 😘 @waisocuteee @jessjinglee @wayne_fny

My mom is the best mom ever as she inspires me through the little things everyday. My mom has dedicated her life to the family. She left her job and chose to stay home to take care of the family. She wasn’t good at cooking, but she learned it through youtube, so we can enjoy nutritious homecooked food everyday. She wasn’t good at cleaning, but she always ensure the home is well maintained and clean for us to stay in. She wasn’t good at baking, but she learned it herself, just so she can bake a cake on our birthdays. She never fails to bake a cake on every of our birthdays. She learns activities we like, just so she can communicate and blend in with us. She put in extra effort when things are not second nature to her. 
This journey as a mother wasn't easy but she made it. She is brave, independent and strong. 
I am grateful to have her shower me with her love and attention. 
I am glad to have her standing by me, even when i am being difficult. 
I am blessed to have her holding my small hands all these while and never once thought of letting it go. 
I am thankful to have her love me when I am so hard to love. @gnxy @mrs_serene_lim @blingnsplitz

My always crazy mom who rant at us (siblings) for being fat but still cook and bake every other day to fatten us up 😂 a ‘latte’. The best mom as she ensure that we are still eating well & be healthy despite all the nagging 😘 
@jebeleanor @jarsmines @wwwwwweileng
My mom's the best cos she always pamper us with her amazing bakes and dishes!

My Mummy is the best Mom because she’s the most positive human being I’ve ever known, finding joy in every thing she does, like picking fruits from trees and even just a stroll around the neighbourhood (with my cat in a pram), she is a workaholic but somehow still find time to enjoy spending time with the family. I SWEAR SHE IZ SUPERHUMAN. And she loves coffee most haha 💕love you @michelleteosc! @alyssapyf  @yensofat87  @jarontanjj
My mom is the best cos she gave birth to a son like me. @twxin @clubmomo @paylehcar @funjoyride
